Education

Francisco Jose de Caldas University

The Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas is one of the leading public higher education institutions in Colombia, recognized for its strong focus on applied research, technological innovation, and the training of highly skilled professionals in engineering, science, arts, and education. With more than 70 years of history, it is the most important public university in Bogotá and one of the country’s top references in engineering and technology programs.

B.Sc. in Telematic Engineer

2018 - 2021

The Telematics Engineering program combines the fields of telecommunications and information technologies, preparing professionals to design, implement, and manage communication networks and distributed software systems. The program provides an interdisciplinary foundation in telecommunications, networking, programming, cloud services, and cybersecurity, enabling graduates to face the challenges of digital transformation and Industry 4.0.

Technical Degree in Data Technologies Systematization

2010 - 2017

The Data Technologies Systematization program is oriented towards training professionals in informatics, databases, and information systems development. Its main focus is on the administration, modeling, and analysis of data, as well as the design and implementation of software solutions to support business management and decision-making processes.
